title: Ontology Version and Source Schema
description: A schema for the set of valid ontology reference files mapping to a CZ CellXGene Dataset Schema Versions

^[0-9]+\\.[0-9]+\\.[0-9]+(-.+)?$.description: The version of CellxGene schema that maps to this set of ontology versions

deprecated_on.description: The date this version was deprecated. The format of the date is YYYY-MM-DD. If this is the current verison then this field will be empty.

version.description: version of ontology canonical to this data release, as defined in its source repo

source.description: Source to find and download canonical ontology version for this data release

filename.description: name of ontology file used to build generated artifacts for this ontology data release

additional_ontologies.description: List of additional term id prefixes to extracted from the source ontology file.

cross_ontology_mapping.description: name of SSSOM file mapping this ontology's terms to cross-species equivalent ontology terms.

map_to.description: List of ontologies to map equivalent terms to this ontology
